files.description: Runs the project's test command in a subprocess, captures stdout/stderr to a timestamped log under outputs/logs/, writes run_stamp.json, and updates outputs/index.md with links to the log and any results artifacts.

Executes the project pipeline entrypoint (configurable command), captures stdout/stderr to outputs/logs/ with a timestamped log, writes run_stamp.json, and updates outputs/index.md to list the run log and produced results files.

Provides shared utilities for timestamped run stamps, creating outputs/logs directories, capturing subprocess output to log files, discovering results artifacts, and updating outputs/index.md deterministically.
Central index documenting the latest and historical run logs in outputs/logs/ along with run_stamp.json and discovered results files for CI/CD traceability.
Project roadmap updated to mark the test-and-log runner and pipeline runner as completed deliverables with links to outputs/index.md and the generated logs/artifacts.

CI workflow that checks out the repo, sets up Python, runs scripts/run_tests_and_capture_log.py and scripts/run_pipeline.py, and uploads outputs/ (logs, index, run_stamp, and results) as build artifacts.

missionDescription: Run scripts/run_tests_and_capture_log.py and scripts/run_pipeline.py (or add them if missing), redirect outputs into ./outputs/logs/, and ensure /outputs/index.md lists these logs plus run_stamp.json and results files; update roadmap_v1.md to link them as completed deliverables.
missionSuccessCriteria: Complete strategic task identified by Meta-Coordinator or escalated by Strategic Tracker

Curated insight (actionability 8-9/10): Capturing stdout/stderr logs from the pipeline and test runner produces the concrete evidence artifacts (logs + run metadata) demanded by goal_55 and makes them indexable in the evidence pack (goal_58...
